&#3905;&#3851;&#3919;: [194] 1) bslab bya/ ... kha tas blo 'gugs/ ... kha ta skul lcag ... mi nyan pa la kha ta byed pa de/ ko ba skam po lag pas mnyed las dka'/ ... 2) (rnying) gces par 'dzin pa'am gces spras/ ...
gsung gros.  Gces 581.6.  Namdak.  = kha brda (?).  nyan mid kyi kha ta 'tshang re che.  602 13v.5.  bcas bcos kha ta byas ma lang.  'Jig-rten-mgon-po, Bka'-'bum IV 515.5.
1) [sincere/ concerned] advice/ counsel; 2) cherishing, caring for, affection
